name: BOMB Pong
description:
BOMB Pong. Avoid the spinning paddles! Dodge the deadly bombs! Escape speeding Evil Balls! Fight your way through 20 Jam-Packed Campaign levels in one of three exciting modes: single player, two Player PvP and endless survival!

Using your arrow keys, steer your Pong ball through twenty intricate and increasingly challenging levels, dodging at high speed as the dangers fly towards you.

From the developer that brought you the BAFTA-recognised Hot Dodge!

Use to arrow keys to move in menus and in gameplay.
